content.question: Which of the following describes the process by which an electron in a hydrogen atom makes a transition from its first excited state to its ground state?

choices.label: The atom gains energy by emitting a photon.
The atom gains energy by absorbing a photon.
The atom loses energy by emitting a photon.
The atom loses energy by absorbing a photon.

content.answer: The atom loses energy by emitting a photon.
